citations.narrative:
There is excessive rusting and flaking of the bottom metal bar of the fence in the north play yard to which dogs have
access when in use. Facilities housing dogs that have surfaces with excessive amounts of rust can affect the structural
integrity of the enclosure and make it difficult to properly clean and sanitize. This may lead to injury or infection in the
dogs. Any surfaces that come in contact with dogs must be free of excessive rust that prevents the required cleaning and
sanitization, or that affects the structural strength of the surface.
Correct by 07 April 2026.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.1(c)(1)(i) 
   
Housing facilities, general. 
There is excessive rusting and flaking of the bottom metal bar of the fence in the north play yard to which dogs have 
access when in use. Facilities housing dogs that have surfaces with excessive amounts of rust can affect the structural 
integrity of the enclosure and make it difficult to properly clean and sanitize. This may lead to injury or infection in the 
dogs. Any surfaces that come in contact with dogs must be free of excessive rust that prevents the required cleaning and 
sanitization, or that affects the structural strength of the surface.  
 
Correct by 07 April 2026. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative. 
 
 n
